meanings.definition: Containing more than one type of grain.
meanings.sent1: The bakery offers a delicious variety of multigrains bread.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the nutritious multigrains cereal for breakfast.
meanings.sent3: The multigrains salad was a hit at the potluck.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was like a multigrains tapestry, blending different colors seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The multigrains soup was a flavorful blend of various grains.

meanings.sent1: The store sells a popular blend of multigrains for baking.
meanings.sent2: I prefer to buy multigrains for my homemade granola.
meanings.sent3: The multigrains in the pantry spilled everywhere when the bag tore.
meanings.sent4: The field of wheat looked like a sea of multigrains swaying in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The multigrains used in the recipe added a unique texture to the dish.
